Html:
Hi everyone,

My team and I are currently working on a project using Visual Studio 2012. As stated in the Installation Guide one has to use Visual Studio 2010. To use Goblin XNA would thus result in a hell of converting code. Is there any chance, that VS 2012 will be supported soon?

 

We would really like to use Goblin XNA as it seems to be perfect for our purposes.

 

Best regards.

Hello reatus, 

 

I had the same problem some weeks ago. The problem is that VS 2012 "does not support " XNA. I use this answer in stackoverflow to solve the problem.

 

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9674758/how-can-i-work-with-xna-projects-in-visual-studio-11-beta/9832283#comment13547530_9832283

 

When I did that, all works well. 

 

Kind Regards
